mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.group_name AS solutionGroupName, t3.realname AS solutionUserName, t4.reason_code AS faultReasonCode, t5.solution_code AS faultSolutionCode FROM bu_fault_handle_record t1 LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_workshop_group t2 ON t2.id = t1.solution_group_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t3 ON t3.id = t1.solution_user_id LEFT JOIN bu_fault_reason t4 ON t4.id = t1.fault_reason_id LEFT JOIN bu_fault_solution t5 ON t5.id = t1.fault_solution_id WHERE t1.fault_info_id = #{id} ORDER BY t1.solution_time DESC
mapper.sql: id, category_id, fault_code_id, fault_sn, fault_desc, sys_id, sub_sys_id, fault_asset_id, happen_time, work_order_id, order_task_id, line_id, train_no, phase, fault_level, f_online, has_duty, outsource, report_group_id, report_user_id, report_time, duty_engineer, status, close_user_id, close_time, submit_status, work_station_id, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, create_type, train_structure_id, handle_status, handle_order_id, out_supplier_id, form_value_id, plan_id, company_id, workshop_id, track_message, from_type
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.fault_desc, t1.group_name AS reportGroupName, t.report_time, t2.name AS sysName, t.status, IFNULL(t3.process_status, '未发起') AS wfStatus, t3.process_candidate FROM bu_fault_info t LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_workshop_group t1 ON t1.id = t.report_group_id LEFT JOIN bu_train_asset_type t2 ON t2.id = t.sys_id LEFT JOIN wf_biz_status t3 ON t3.business_key = t.id WHERE t.submit_status != 2 and t.report_time is not null ORDER BY t.report_time DESC LIMIT 0,#{num}

SELECT t.*, t1.line_name AS lineName, t2.name AS sysName, t3.asset_name AS faultAssetName, t4.group_name AS reportGroupName, t5.name as outSupplierName, t6.plan_name, IFNULL(t7.process_status, '未发起') AS wfStatus, t7.process_candidate FROM bu_fault_info t LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_line t1 ON t1.line_id = t.line_id LEFT JOIN bu_train_asset_type t2 ON t2.id = t.sys_id LEFT JOIN bu_train_asset t3 ON t3.id = t.fault_asset_id LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_workshop_group t4 ON t4.id = t.report_group_id LEFT JOIN bu_base_supplier t5 ON t5.id = t.out_supplier_id LEFT JOIN bu_repair_plan t6 ON t6.id = t.plan_id LEFT JOIN wf_biz_status t7 ON t7.business_key = t.id WHERE t.id = #{id}
